titles.title: Health Savings Account Expansion Act of 2019
Health Savings Account Expansion Act of 2019
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals who are not enrolled in a high deductible health plan to have access to health savings accounts, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Health Savings Account Expansion Act of 2019
This bill permits individuals who are not enrolled in a high deductible health plan to participate in health savings accounts. It also increases the allowable amount of the deduction for contributions to such accounts.
